name: Meatloaf
description: A classic comfort food made with ground beef and pork, mushrooms, and topped with a tangy ketchup glaze.
ingredients: Almost 3/4 cup chicken broth (3 tablespoons plus 1/2 cup)
instructions: Mise en Place:
Oven and Baking Sheet
Set an oven rack to the middle of your oven
Preheat oven to 350°

Fold aluminium foil into a 9″ by 5″ rectangle. Put it in the center of a wire rack and use a paring knife OR FONDUE FORK  to poke about 1/2″ apart. Set rack in a rimmed baking sheet lined with foil (for easy cleanup).
Meat
Measure 1 pound ground beef into medium bowl.
Measure 1 pound ground pork into beef bowl.
Vegetables
Measure 6 oz. of mushrooms.
Thinly slice mushrooms and put in a medium bowl.
Chop fine 1 onion and add to mushroom bowl.
Measure out 1 Tablespoon of tomato paste.
Mince ⅓ cup of parsley and put into small bowl.
Measure 2 Teaspoons dijon mustard and add to parsley bowl.
Measure ¾ Teaspoon pepper and add to parsley bowl.
Measure ½ Teaspoon dried thyme adn to parsley bowl.
Measure 1Tablespoon garlic paste (or crush and mince press 2 cloves garlic) into tiny bowl.
The Rest
Break 1 slice of white bread into 1 in. cubes and put into food processor
Measure 1/2-cup chicken broth into a small bowl.
Measure 2 Tablespoons soy sauce into chicken broth bowl.
Add an egg to chicken broth bowl.
Measure 1 Tablespoon unflavored gelatin in a tiny bowl.
Measure 3 Tablespoons of chicken broth in a ramekin
Meatloaf
Range
Put at 12″ skillet over medium burner and melt 2 Tablespoons of butter until the foaming begins to subside.
Saute onions and mushrooms for 12 minutes until they begin to brown.
Add in the tomato paste and continue cooking for 3 more minutes; stir constantly.
Turn down burner to low.
add garlic directly into the pan.
Use small bowl of chicken broth to deglaze the pan.
Cook for about 1 minutes then empty into a large bowl.
Counter
Whisk to combine ingredients in chicken broth bowl
Sprinkle chicken broth bowl with unflavored gelatin.
allow it to soften for 5 minutes.
Food Processor
Add bread cubes to food processor and pulse between 5 to 10 times.
Add gelatin/egg mixture, onion/mushrooms, and parsley bowl into food processor.
Pulse 10 more times until everything becomes finely ground.
Empty into your large bowl (the one in which the onions cooled).
Counter 2
Add ground beef and ground pork to bowl.
Combine thoroughly using your hands.
Form into a 9″ by 5″ rectangle on the prepared half-sheet.
Oven
Bake for about 80 minutes until the internal temperature of the meat loaf reaches 160-degrees.
Prepare glaze while meatloaf is cooking (See Below).
Remove meatloaf tray from the oven.
Preheat the broiler.
Proceed to finishing.
Glaze (Range 2)
Measure ½ cup ketchup into small saucepan.
Measure ¼ cup cider vinegar into small saucepan.
Measure 3 Tablespoons packed brown sugar into small saucepan.
Measure 1 teaspoon Tabasco sauce into small saucepan.
Grind 1/2 teaspoon of coriander and put into small saucepan.
Cook over medium heat for 5 minutes until it becomes thick.
Divide in half
Set aside until meatloaf finishes cooking in step 17.
Finishing
Use a rubber spatula to evenly cover the meatloaf with half the glaze.
Broil for 2 minutes.
When the glaze begins to bubble and brown, remove the meatloaf and evenly coat with the rest of the glaze.
Broil for 2 more minutes, removing from broiler when the glaze begins to bubble and brown.
Allow to cool for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.
